name: frisk

effect.black_white: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
effect.black_2_white_2: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.

short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

flavor_text.black_white: The Pokémon can check a foe’s held item.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The Pokémon can check a foe’s held item.
